featured.text: Members can access thousands of listings for apartments, villas, suburban homes and farms around the world.
Founded in 1992, with some 28,000 listings, this company itself as the world’s largest home exchange club, reporting that membership has increased 30% this year.

definition.zh_def: 列出或清單的行為或結果。
definition.en_def: The act or result of making a list or inventory.
definition.example: She created a listing of all the items needed for the party.
